name: Engulfing EMA Volume Strategy
description: Daily-timeframe candlestick strategy for large-cap U.S. equities. Trades bullish/bearish engulfing patterns that occur on above-average volume and are aligned with the 15-day EMA. Risk management uses fixed-fractional sizing (1 % equity risk), ATR-based stop (1.1×) and take-profit (1.65×), with time-in-trade limited externally to 5 sessions.
